steps.instruction: Head southeast on Carrer de Tous
steps.name: Carrer de Tous

steps.instruction: Turn left onto Calle de Alemania
steps.name: Calle de Alemania

steps.instruction: Turn sharp right onto Avenida del Primado Reig
steps.name: Avenida del Primado Reig

steps.instruction: Turn right onto Calle del Maestro Esteban Catalá
steps.name: Calle del Maestro Esteban Catalá

steps.instruction: Turn sharp right onto Calle del Bachiller
steps.name: Calle del Bachiller

steps.instruction: Continue straight onto Calle de Jaca
steps.name: Calle de Jaca

steps.instruction: Turn left
Turn slight left
Continue straight onto Carrer Santa Amalia
steps.name: Carrer Santa Amalia

steps.instruction: Continue straight onto Pont de Fusta
steps.name: Pont de Fusta

steps.instruction: Turn slight right
Turn left onto Plaça dels Furs
steps.name: Plaça dels Furs

steps.instruction: Turn right onto Carrer del Comte de Trénor
steps.name: Carrer del Comte de Trénor

steps.instruction: Turn slight left onto Carrer del Comte de Trénor
steps.name: Carrer del Comte de Trénor

steps.instruction: Turn slight left onto Carrer de Nàquera
steps.name: Carrer de Nàquera

steps.instruction: Turn right
Turn slight right onto Carrer de Roteros
steps.name: Carrer de Roteros

steps.instruction: Turn sharp right onto Carrer Moret
steps.name: Carrer Moret

steps.instruction: Turn sharp right onto Carrer de la Blanqueria
steps.name: Carrer de la Blanqueria

steps.instruction: Arrive at Carrer de la Blanqueria, on the right
